name: Molten West
description:
Welcome to the wasteland,where the undeads roam and the unpleasent atmosphere is everywhere. Darkness is surrounding you,waste your mind and proceed as the area opens up each rounds. Kill the ones blocking your path and achieve the two legendary Diamonds. 



WADS - Movement
Shift - Dash
E - interact
Tab - Weapon swap
q - map

Collect upgrade chips to upgrade your weapon carefully.

Special enemies can be encountered for a unique mechanic. Killing special enemies gives upgrade chips.


This game was made in 11 days. It will be updated as time goes on as not every goals were reached.


Game Creator - Loxmer Larson
Sound Designers and composer - aadishiva and Trumpetguy(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ5puY_5lOTDKl6EAPeTuFg)

"HQ Explosion" by Quaker540(https://freesound.org/s/245372/) licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) Public Domain Dedication
